<title level="1" right="Rules">[Occult Magic Terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=1551)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 220 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
In areas of occult magic, emotions run hotter, passions flare, and a mysterious intent permeates. Any creature casting an occult spell gains a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks, and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks until the end of its next turn.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Occult Magic Terrain
